experiences: Building the foundation for web development by learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Participants learn to use popular front-end frameworks like React.js, along with key development tools such as Git for version control, enabling efficient and collaborative coding practicesx.
Understanding the process of deploying web applications and hosting them on platforms like GitHub Pages, Netlify, or other hosting services
Developing effective communication skills, collaboration, and the ability to work in a team environment.
